values.value: SELECT id, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingStateCode, BillingCountry, BillingCountryCode,BillingPostalCode,shippingStreet, shippingCity, shippingState, shippingStateCode, shippingCountry, shippingCountryCode,shippingPostalCode ,AcctSeed__GL_Account_Variable_3__c FROM ACCOUNT WHERE PersonEmail = '<Email>'
